77163.summary: Some customers in the Rutland area of Kelowna are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
77163.title: May 24 - Kelowna (Rutland) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

77165.title: May 24 - Thunder Bay (Westfort) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
